title: Update regarding BlockChain Verify
story_body:
BLOCKCHAIN VERIFY (BLK) ISSUES ROUTINE UPDATE

NEW YORK, NY - 08:00 EST - BLOCKCHAIN VERIFY (BLK), a leading provider of blockchain-based verification solutions, announced the following updates:

Personnel Update:
BLOCKCHAIN VERIFY (BLK) has appointed Jane Doe as Senior Manager, Business Development, effective February 1, 2023. Ms. Doe will be responsible for leading the company's business development efforts in the North American region.

Marketing Update:
BLOCKCHAIN VERIFY (BLK) has launched a new website, available at www.blockchainverify.com, featuring enhanced navigation and updated product information. The new website is designed to provide improved user experience and easier access to information on the company's verification solutions.

ESG Update:
BLOCKCHAIN VERIFY (BLK) has published its 2022 Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) Report, highlighting the company's commitment to sustainability and social responsibility. The report is available on the company's website and provides an overview of BLOCKCHAIN VERIFY's ESG initiatives and progress.

About BLOCKCHAIN VERIFY (BLK):
BLOCKCHAIN VERIFY (BLK) is a leading provider of blockchain-based verification solutions. The company's solutions are designed to provide secure and transparent verification of data and transactions.
